Address.label: Address
Address.value: 628 MAIN STREET, DANVILLE, Virginia, 24541, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: American National Bankshares Inc is a one-bank holding company. The Bank provides a full array of financial products and services, including commercial, mortgage, and consumer banking; trust and investment services; and insurance. Services are also provided through 37 Automated Teller Machines, Online Banking, and Telephone Banking. The company has two reportable segments, community banking and wealth management.

value.name: Jeffrey W. Farrar
value.title: Chief Operating Officer, CFO, Secretary & EVP
